p: Some other viruses for which LAMP has not been developed till now are as follows: tomato bushy stunt virus, peanut stunt virus, peony ring spot virus, psoriasis A virus, bean common mosaic virus, lettuce mosaic virus, fanleaf disease virus, wheat streak mosaic virus, bud blight virus, rose mosaic virus, zucchini yellow mosaic virus, cankers virus, alfalfa mosaic virus, bean yellow mosaic virus, tobacco etch virus, wound tumor virus, pea enation mosaic virus, quirking virus (on datura), sugarcane mosaic virus, etc.
